languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс с явным трудом отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Прости. Ты права. Просто... просто побудь со мной еще немного рядом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс с явным трудом отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Прости. Ты права. Просто... просто побудь со мной еще немного рядом".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс с явным трудом отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Прости. Ты права. Просто... просто побудь со мной еще немного рядом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."
{n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."
{n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."
{n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."

languages.text: {n}海因里希极力克制住了自己，从你身边退开。{/n}“我很抱歉，你说得对。请……请在我身边再待一会儿吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希极力克制住了自己，从你身边退开。{/n}“我很抱歉，你说得对。请……请在我身边再待一会儿吧。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se aleja de ti con un gran esfuerzo.{/n} «Lo siento. Tiene razón, pero... quédese a mi lado un rato más».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se aleja de ti con un gran esfuerzo.{/n} «Lo siento. Tiene razón, pero... quédese a mi lado un rato más».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたから離れる。その動きは、明らかに後ろ髪を引かれるようだった。{/n}「すまない。あなたの言う通りだ。ただ…もう少しだけそばにいてくれないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたから離れる。その動きは、明らかに後ろ髪を引かれるようだった。{/n}「すまない。あなたの言う通りだ。ただ…もう少しだけそばにいてくれないか」

languages.text: {n}Avec un effort visible, Heinrix finit par reculer.{/n} « Je suis désolé. Vous avez raison, mais... restez à mes côtés quelques instants encore. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un effort visible, Heinrix finit par reculer.{/n} « Je suis désolé. Vous avez raison, mais... restez à mes côtés quelques instants encore. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zieht sich augenscheinlich von dir zurück.{/n} "Es tut mir leid. Ihr habt recht. Bleibt einfach ... noch etwas länger neben mir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zieht sich augenscheinlich von dir zurück.{/n} "Es tut mir leid. Ihr habt recht. Bleibt einfach ... noch etwas länger neben mir."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, aşikâr bir çaba sarf ederek kendini senden çekiyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm. Haklısın. Sadece... Biraz daha yanımda kal."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix withdraws from you with obvious effort.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right. Just... just stay beside me for a little while longer."
